sn_cmp_cloud_template.body:
{
 "name": "example-config-with-templates",
 "target": {
  "config": {
   "content": "resources:
- name: vm-created-by-cloud-config
  type: compute.v1.instance
  properties:
    zone: us-central1-a
    machineType: https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/myproject/zones/us-central1-a/machineTypes/n1-standard-1
    disks:
    - deviceName: boot
      type: PERSISTENT
      boot: true
      autoDelete: true
      initializeParams:
        diskName: disk-created-by-cloud-config
        sourceImage: https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/debian-cloud/global/images/debian-7-wheezy-v20151104
    networkInterfaces:
    - network: https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/myproject/global/networks/default
"
  }
 }
}
sn_cmp_cloud_template.name: GDM0001
